title: NITTTR Bhopal Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Technical Resource Post
description: National Institute of Technical Teachers Training and Research, Bhopal (NITTTR) has announced the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Technical Resource Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, MCA, and M.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the NITTTR Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, and application fee. and how to apply for the posts is mentioned below. The application pro...
